Name: JermaSlots
About the game: Hey gamers! That's right! You! Ever wanted to step into the compact shoes of everyone's favorite TOP 1000 TWITCH streamer, Jerma985 and spend your hard earned BIG BITS on a slot machine? Well now is your chance!* So load up, go grab yourself a nice hot cup of coffee, hot cup of cocoa. I got apple cider right here freshly brewed. Let me take a sip, ah that's some good cider! FEATURES Jerma Emote Slot Machine! SIX winning combinations all with their own events! Escape Menu Cheats to get all winning combinations and see all the events and mini-games! Three Additional mini-games revolving around JUP, Glueman, and the ever lovable Byeahs! Three graphics modes including 'Full', 'Half', and even 'None'! (additional advanced options also available) Tons of references to Jerma985 and the Jerma985 expanded universe! *NO ACTUAL BITS OR BALDCOINS ARE EXCHANGED NOTE: This game is purely a fan game and is not affiliated with Jerma985. He did not commission the game and any views or content in game is not representative of Jerma985. This game is 100% free with absolutely no advertisements or any in game purchases.
